sentence.text: I like this television very much.
sentence.textCn: 我非常喜欢这台电视机。

sentence.text: It's the most expensive model in the shop.

sentence.textCn: 这对我们来说是太贵了。

sentence.text: We can't afford all that money.
This model's less expensive than that one.
sentence.textCn: 这种型号的比那种要便宜些。

sentence.text: But, of course, it's not as good as the expensive one.
sentence.textCn: 但是，它当然没有价钱高的那种好。

sentence.text: The other model's more expensive, but it's worth the money.
sentence.textCn: 那一种型号价格是贵一些，但它值这么多钱。

sentence.text: Can we buy it on instalments?
sentence.textCn: 我们可以用分期付款的方式购买吗？

sentence.text: You can pay a deposit of thirty pounds, and then fourteen pounds a month for three years.
sentence.textCn: 您可以先付30英镑定金，然后每月14镑，3年付清。

sentence.text: I certainly do, but I don't like the price.
sentence.textCn: 我当然喜欢，但是我不喜欢这个价钱。

sentence.text: You always want the best, but we can't afford it.
sentence.textCn: 你总是要买最好的，可我们买不起。

sentence.text: Sometimes you think you're a millionaire!
sentence.textCn: 有时候你认为自己是个百万富翁！

sentence.text: Millionaires don't buy things on instalments!
sentence.textCn: 百万富翁是不会分期付款买东西的！
